description: This file defines a NotesRepository class for managing note objects, including methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes, with localStorage support and placeholders for API integration.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: A class providing methods to manage notes, with localStorage fallback and API support placeholders.

methods.name: getApiBase
methods.description: Retrieves the API base URL from environment variables, preferring VITE_API_BASE over VITE_BACKEND_URL.

methods.name: uid
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier based on current timestamp and random string.

methods.name: safeReadAll
methods.description: Reads all notes from localStorage, handling errors and server environment.

methods.name: safeWriteAll
methods.description: Writes notes array to localStorage, handling errors and server environment.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns all notes, optionally filtered by a search query.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with optional title and content.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note by ID with provided fields.
